title: Land for sale in piliyandala 2.7M
details:
9 perches of land
Close proximity to the towns Piliyandala & Kesbewa. peaceful residential area, calm & quiet neighbourhood.
Clear Deed
Highly developing residential area.
Easy access to Southern Express Way, Airport Express Way via Kahathuduwa Interchange.
3-Phase Electricity, Clear Title, Private Roadway, Wide Tar Roads
Price Conditions: Rs 300 000 per pe
